title: Fasting more than 3 days per Week
transcript: [Music] is it permissible to fast Mondays Tuesdays Wednesdays and Thursdays every week the answer is no because this is more than half of the week you are entitled to fast maximum half of the year which Cascades down to half of the month which Cascades to a day in and a day out but to fast 4 days a week this is more than half of it and this is not permissible if you fast for example Monday Thursday and let's say Sunday this is okay no problem inshallah in that
